segments.text: Did you read the letter in the paper about smoking ? The person who wrote that must be crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think so . I think the government should do everything it can to discourage people from smoking .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe so . But a law banning cigarettes will do no good .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you can ’ t suddenly make smoking illegal , but government could prohibit smoking in public places like movies and theatres .
segments.speaker: S2
